name: Unlimited Fight Ultimate Strike
description:
In the best 3D style, continuation of the first game in the Unlimited Fight series, with improvements in combat mechanics, visuals, stories and much more, immerse yourself in this world full of action, epic and intense battles alone or with friends.

For different reasons and motivations, several of the best fighters around the world participate in the Unlimited Fight tournament, created by Gordon Osward a big crime boss with many obscure motives and personal interests unknown to the fighters.

Immerse yourself in this world and discover the dark objectives behind this tournament, going through several combats with simplified gameplay, easy to learn but with deep and innovative mechanics.

This game offers simple commands for gameplay, the game has four buttons for main attacks (Light Punch, Light Kick, Heavy Punch, Heavy Kick) and you can combine all these buttons with arrow keys to perform special attacks. The game also includes buttons to grab your opponent and make a super with a single click, even with these simplified commands the game offers a variety of different possibilities for creating combos during fights and it is possible to make a simple combo just by pressing the Heavy Punch Button several times.

Play the game online with your friends online or locally (controller is required for local multiplayer).

Join us on this great adventure.
